examples.text: The people believed the girl was possessed by demons.
demons torturing the sinners in Hell
an ancient ritual to exorcise demons
tales of travellers attacked by evil demons

definitions.definition: something that causes a person to worry and makes them unhappy

examples.text: She's had to battle her personal demons throughout her adult life.
He is plagued by demons which go back to his traumatic childhood.

definitions.definition: a person who does something very well or with a lot of energy

examples.text: He’s a demon: he gets up early, he works out, he goes home early, he studies, he works out again…

wordOrigin: Middle English: from medieval Latin, from Latin daemon, from Greek daimōn ‘deity, genius’; in sense (1) also from Latin daemonium ‘lesser or evil spirit’, from Greek daemonion, diminutive of daimōn.
